title: fml
body: wait 19 minutes of my 20 minute ban and then gf decides to come over unannounced. sigh. thats 19 mins wasted

replies.body: We all feel your pain. When you sit there for 19 minutes then need to take a dump and miss the match making and have to start again that is the saddest feeling especially when you can hear the tone from the toilet and cant jump up to get it.
Don't open the door and sit quiet until she leaves.
the struggle man. i understand your pain. R.I.P
